articles.description: The F5 Pro is powered by a Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chipset, the vanilla F5 got a chip that's almost as good, the Snapdragon 7+ Gen 2.
articles.content: The new Poco F5 and F5 Pro phones are a good example of the value for money devices that define the F-series. They are priced as mid-rangers but are equipped as year old flagships in most aspects bes… [+2494 chars]

articles.author: Divyanshi Sharma
articles.title: Google employee fired after 15 years of service, says company will always have a special place in her heart - India Today
articles.description: A Google employee, who was among the 12,000 people who were fired from the tech giant, took to LinkedIn and shared her layoff story. She was with the company for 15 years.
articles.content: By Divyanshi Sharma: Tech layoffs brutally shook up the industry in January this year when tech giants like Google and Amazon announced large-scale layoffs. In a short span of time, thousands of empl… [+2271 chars]
